descr.text: Welcome to RAW, the game-changing dating app that is going viral across real folx. We’re all about true, unfiltered connections.

descr2.text:
No fakes, no catfishing, and no scams here – just
authentic raw people looking to fall in love at first
sight.

items.title: This one changed my mind
items.descr: I've always been skeptical of new dating apps, but this one changed my mind. I haven't seen any scammers whatsoever, everyone seems totally real, and I can just swipe left and right without worry. I got a match really quickly, set up a date, and surprise — it was the best date I've ever had from a dating app.

items.title: Thank you, RAW!
items.descr: Ghosted so many times, I had lost all hope. Then I downloaded RAW. Everyone on here answers so fast I almost can't keep up. I got so many likes so soon. My self-confidence is back. Thank you, RAW!
